quotes.quote: There is only one right way to eat a steak - with greed in your heart and a smile on your face.
Just knock off the horns and hair, and toss it on the coals for about thirty seconds on each side. I like mine still kicking and quivering!
I think steak is the ultimate comfort food, and if you're going out for one, that isn't the time to scrimp on calories or quality.
To eat steak rare... represents both a nature and a morality.
I eat steak primarily. That's pretty much what my diet consists of. Sometimes I supplement that with other steaks.
I take a vitamin every day; it's called a steak.
I used to be shy about ordering a steak after I had eaten a steak sandwich, but I got used to it.

If you're dining with someone who wants the same cut, it's always better to get a 16-ounce steak and split it than to order two eight-ounce steaks. The longer something cooks, the more flavor it develops, so you'll get a better taste with a bigger piece of meat.
The only time to eat diet food is while you are waiting for the steak to cook.
My favorite animal is steak.
The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
I'll stop eating steak when you stop killing spiders.
After you have witnessed the reality, you can no longer look at a piece of steak, and simply think "yum".
Screw chocolate. A good steak is where it’s at.

When something's well done, it's usually the steak.
I hate reality but it's still the best place to get a good steak.
If you want to sell a steak, you can't just have the sizzle, you gotta have sauce.

I usually eat a pretty big steak the night before I compete.
Steak is delicious.
